title: Water gun fight turns tragic when real bullet hits 15-year-old girl
content:
A 15-year-old girl is recovering from injuries after being shot during a party in Spring, according to reports Saturday night.
People at the family gathering were playing with water guns when a real gun was pulled," police told KHOU and other TV stations.
KTRK-TV reported the girl was transported to Memorial Hermann Hospital in The Woodlands after being shot in the shoulder at a home on Roth Forest Lane. They report she's is listed in stable condition.
According to a KHOU report, a man in his 40s is being questioned by investigators at the scene but no arrests have been made.
